objectives: Understand complex texts about small business challenges
Identify main arguments and supporting details

multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about small business challenges
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of small business challenges
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to small business challenges
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about small business challenges
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss small business challenges
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to small business challenges

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about small business challenges
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about small business challenges
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about small business challenges

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Quiet space with good acoustics and audio equipment

warm_up.description: Students listen to audio about small business challenges and share reactions

main_activities.description: Students receive information about small business challenges through auditory modality
Students practice language related to small business challenges using auditory approach
Students produce original content about small business challenges demonstrating basic thinking

discussion_prompts: Can you describe small business challenges?
What do you know about small business challenges?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for small business challenges
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to small business challenges

homework_options.required: Core assignment at basic level using auditory approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
